title: Can not login to PBE
body:
I don't know why but i cannot log into PBE, i don't think i am banned because there is no reason, but if i am, i would have been notified, would i not? 

I Can't even Log into  the Bug Report Website... i thought serves were down, but my friend could log in Easily... help... Please

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Arkelar,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=aM3WgQKg,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-24T02:17:41.818+0000)
>
> I don&#039;t know why but i cannot log into PBE, i don&#039;t think i am banned because there is no reason, but if i am, i would have been notified, would i not? 
> 
> I Can&#039;t even Log into  the Bug Report Website... i thought serves were down, but my friend could log in Easily... help... Please

It doesn't say that i have been Deactivated, and i am not sure what exactly is happening...

If your account has been deactivated, it means we'll need you to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can sort this out together.

If you run into any issues submitting your ticket, let me know.
